option.name: notice
option.value:
$project.name#if($module.name && $module.name != $project.name) ($module.name)#end: $file.fileName #set($copyrightNames = $originalComment.match("Copyright \(C\).*?([a-zA-Z0-9,\s]*)", 1)) #set($myUsername = "mtctx") #set($hasMyName = $copyrightNames.contains($myUsername)) #set($namesArray = $copyrightNames.replaceAll("^\s*|\s*$", "").split(",\s*")) #set($hasOtherNames = false) #foreach($name in $namesArray) #if($name.trim().length() > 0 && $name.trim() != $myUsername) #set($hasOtherNames = true) #break #end #end #set($finalNames = $copyrightNames) #if($hasOtherNames && !$hasMyName) #set($finalNames = $copyrightNames.trim() + ", " + $myUsername) #end #if(!$hasOtherNames && !$hasMyName) #set($finalNames = $myUsername) #end Copyright (C) $originalComment.match("Copyright \(c\) (\d+)", 1, "-")$today.year $finalNames This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the **GNU General Public License** as published by the Free Software Foundation, either **version 3** of the License, or (at your option) any later version.
This program is distributed WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; see the GNU General Public License for more details, which you should have received with this program.
SPDX-FileCopyrightText: $originalComment.match("Copyright \(c\) (\d+)", 1, "-")$today.year $finalNames SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0-only
